vfit module:¶

Routines for looking at relations of vmicro or vmacro as a function of other parameters

holtz.apogee.vfit.fit_vmicro(file, mhmin=-1, loggmax=3.8, vrange=[0, 4], degree=1, reject=0)[source]¶

Fit microturbulence relation with 1D f(log g) and 2D f(Teff, logg) fits, plots

Parameters:file – file with calib structure
Keyword args :
degree : degree of fit (default=1) mhmin : minimum [M/H] (default=-1) loggmax : maximum log g (default=3.8) vrange : scaling range for vmacro plot, vrange[1] sets maximum good vmacro
Returns:1D and 2D polynomial fits
Return type:fit1d, fit2d
holtz.apogee.vfit.fit_vmacro(file, mhmin=-1, loggmax=3.8, vrange=[1, 15], degree=1)[source]¶

Fit macroturbulence relation with 1D f(log g) and 2D f(Teff, logg) fits, plots

Parameters:file – file with calib structure
Keyword args :
degree : degree of fit (default=1) mhmin : minimum [M/H] (default=-1) loggmax : maximum log g (default=3.8) vrange : scaling range for vmacro plot, vrange[1] sets maximum good vmacro
Returns:1D and 2D polynomial fits
Return type:fit1d, fit2d
holtz.apogee.vfit.litplot(mass=1, feh=0)[source]¶

Plots literature vmacro relations

Returns Massarotti vmacro as f(teff,logl,feh)

  • logg – input logg
  • feh – input feh
Returns:

vmacro

holtz.apogee.vfit.read(file)[source]¶

Reads an allStar file and parses and returns teff, logg, mh, vmicro, vmacro, meanfib

Parameters:file – name of file to read
Returns:teff, logg, mh, vmicro, vmacro, meanfib
